name: Cedars-Sinai Medical Center
specialties: Cardiology, Oncology, Orthopedics, Neurology, Organ Transplant
insurance: Aetna, Anthem Blue Cross, Blue Shield of CA, Cigna, Medicare, Medicaid
treatments: Organ Transplant, Cancer Treatment, Robotic Surgery
description: Cedars-Sinai Medical Center in Los Angeles is a top-tier academic hospital, tied for #1 in California, known for innovative cardiac, cancer, and orthopedic care.
visiting_hours: Monday–Friday: 8:00 AM – 8:00 PM, Saturday–Sunday: 9:00 AM – 5:00 PM
emergency_services: 24/7 Emergency Room, Level I Trauma Center
parking_accessibility: Paid parking garage and valet available. Wheelchair accessible. Free hospital shuttle services within campus.
patient_review: The care I received at Cedars was outstanding. Doctors explained everything clearly and I felt safe the entire time. – James R.
departments: Cardiology, Oncology, Neurology, Gastroenterology, Orthopedics, Pulmonology, Organ Transplant, Rheumatology, Emergency Medicine, Robotic Surgery, Intensive Care
